channel.title: admin on Abhijit Mishra
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Abhijit Mishra

item.description: I am an ML Scientist in the Siri International team at Apple inc., Seattle. Before this I was a part of IBM Research, Bangalore, India, serving as Research Scientist in the department of AI Tech. I have obtained Ph.D in Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) from IIT Bombay, under the guidance of Prof. Pushpak Bhattacharyya. Here is my CV.
